name: Clamperl
description: CLAMPERL’s sturdy shell is not only good for protection - it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown CLAMPERL’s shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.effect: Moves cannot score critical hits against this Pokémon.  This ability functions identically to battle armor.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage with each hit from a damaging dark-, ghost-, or bug-type move.
abilities.description: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed.
